title: Carolina Brights and a Lenox FS

posts.post_title: Carolina Brights and a Lenox FS
posts.post_content:
SGC 1 Carolina Brigths Batch- $775 only 3 shown graded on PSA pop report. No recent sales I could find

SGC A Carolina Brights Stanage- SOLD 7 graded on PSA pop report. Only recent sale was a 2.5.

SGC A Lenox Ball Cleveland- SOLD 4 graded on psa pop report. Only recent sale was a 4.

Prices include tracked bubble mailer shipping. Paypal friends please ok if goods but add 3%. Pm is fine if you prefer email my email is [url]dkiekhefer@gmail.com[/url]. Sold comment trumps on going negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
How much did Lenox Ball sell for?
